typeSystemDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.typesystems.MeasurementTypeSystem
typeSystemDescription.description: This type system contains types for measurements and units.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.Measurement
typeDescription.description: A measurement combining a numeric value and a unit.

featureDescription.name: unit
featureDescription.description: The unit of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: The numeric value of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: normalizedUnit
featureDescription.description: Normalized string value of the unit.

featureDescription.name: normalizedAsciiUnit
featureDescription.description: Ascii normalized string value of the unit.

featureDescription.name: normalizedValue
featureDescription.description: The normalized value of the measurement. This value is the result of the transformation of the numeric value according to the transformation of the unit to its standard unit.

featureDescription.name: normalized
featureDescription.description: The concatenation of the normalized numeric value and the ascii normalized unit.

featureDescription.name: parsedUnit
featureDescription.description: Optional parsable unit string which replaces the unit annotation. It is utilized for normalization.

featureDescription.name: normalizedAscii
featureDescription.description: Ascii normalized string value of the unit.

featureDescription.name: parsed
featureDescription.description: String value of the parsed/identified unit.

featureDescription.name: normalized
featureDescription.description: Normalized string value of the unit.

featureDescription.name: dimension
featureDescription.description: The dimension of the unit in the form like '[L]^3' for volume

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.MeasurementInterval
typeDescription.description: An interval defined by two measurements, a low and high limit.

featureDescription.name: low
featureDescription.description: The lower bound of the interval.

featureDescription.name: high
featureDescription.description: The upper bound of the interval.

featureDescription.name: lowExcluded
featureDescription.description: Marker set to true if the lower bound itself is not part of the interval.

featureDescription.name: highExcluded
featureDescription.description: Marker set to true if the upper bound itself is not part of the interval.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.SimpleMeasurementInterval
typeDescription.description: An interval extending MeasurementInterval with several primitive features representing two measurements.

featureDescription.name: lowNormalizedUnit
featureDescription.description: The normalized unit of the lower bound.

featureDescription.name: lowNormalizedValue
featureDescription.description: The normalized value of the lower bound.

featureDescription.name: lowNormalized
featureDescription.description: The normalized value combined with the normalized unit of the lower bound.

featureDescription.name: lowParsedUnit
featureDescription.description: The parsed unit of the lower bound.

featureDescription.name: highNormalizedUnit
featureDescription.description: The normalized unit of the upper bound.

featureDescription.name: highNormalizedValue
featureDescription.description: The normalized value of the upper bound.

featureDescription.name: highNormalized
featureDescription.description: The normalized value combined with the normalized unit of the upper bound.

featureDescription.name: highParsedUnit
featureDescription.description: The parsed unit of the upper bound.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.RelativeMeasurementInterval
typeDescription.description: A relative interval defined by two measurements, a base and deflection.

featureDescription.name: base
featureDescription.description: The base of the interval.

featureDescription.name: deflection
featureDescription.description: The deflection of the interval.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.IntervalIndicator
typeDescription.description: A textual representation indicating something an interval like '-' or 'bis'

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.ComparisonIndicator
typeDescription.description: A textual representation of a comparison like '<=' or 'unter', also able to indicate an interval.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.GreaterIndicator
typeDescription.description: A textual representation indicating something is 'greater', also able to indicate an interval.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.LessIndicator
typeDescription.description: A textual representation indicating something is 'less', also able to indicate an interval.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.NoUnit
typeDescription.description: A textual position that is not a unit.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.DictionaryMeasurementMention
typeDescription.description: A textual representation indicating a measurement. This is a helper type for measurements that combine numeric values and units or cause other problems for the unit parsing.

featureDescription.name: value
featureDescription.description: Parseable value of the measurement.

featureDescription.name: unit
featureDescription.description: Parseable unit of the measurement.

typeDescription.name: de.averbis.textanalysis.types.measurement.UnitParseAnchor
typeDescription.description: Helper type to use as anchor for unit parsing.
